column3: @morcos  suggested an alternative would be to use `std::ceil` in all cases. This also changes the dust value by a small amount (fa03771), so I am not sure if this really is preferred?\n

I don't know what is the expected usage, but wouldn't it be simpler to just add a CFeeRate::GetFeeSatoshis(size) method ?
Maybe that would be too disruptive for the indended use, I don't really know.

EDIT: 
Although it may look unrelated, maybe this would also a good opportunity to move CFeeRate, CTxOut::GetDustThreshold() and CTxOut::IsDust() finally out of libconsensus. Something like https
